speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0001/2007 ) by Manuel António dos Santos, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on the macro-economic impact of the increase in the price of energy ( 2006/2247(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0001/2007 ) by Manuel António dos Santos, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on the macro-economic impact of the increase in the price of energy ( 2006/2247(INI) ).
